mapper.insert: INSERT INTO document ( user_id, category_id, file_name, original_name, file_type, file_extension, file_size, file_path, file_url, mime_type, description, tags, download_count, view_count, status, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{fileName}, #{originalName}, #{fileType}, #{fileExtension}, #{fileSize}, #{filePath}, #{fileUrl}, #{mimeType}, #{description}, #{tags}, #{downloadCount}, #{viewCount}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE document SET category_id = #{categoryId}, file_name = #{fileName}, description = #{description}, tags = #{tags}, status = #{status}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, category_id, file_name, original_name, file_type, file_extension, file_size, file_path, file_url, mime_type, description, tags, download_count, view_count, status, create_time, update_time FROM document WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, user_id, category_id, file_name, original_name, file_type, file_extension, file_size, file_path, file_url, mime_type, description, tags, download_count, view_count, status, create_time, update_time FROM document WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND category_id = #{categoryId} AND status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT id, user_id, category_id, file_name, original_name, file_type, file_extension, file_size, file_path, file_url, mime_type, description, tags, download_count, view_count, status, create_time, update_time FROM document WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT id, user_id, category_id, file_name, original_name, file_type, file_extension, file_size, file_path, file_url, mime_type, description, tags, download_count, view_count, status, create_time, update_time FROM document WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1 AND (file_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR original_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.delete: UPDATE document SET status = 0, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE document SET download_count = download_count + 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE document SET view_count = view_count + 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
